mapper.insert: insert into problems (pid, title, labels, problemDesc, totalSubmit, acSubmit, exampleInput, exampleOutput, competitionOnly, memoryLimit, timeLimit) values (#{pid}, #{title}, #{labels}, #{problemDesc}, 0, 0, #{exampleInput}, #{exampleOutput}, ${competitionOnly}, ${memoryLimit}, ${timeLimit})
mapper.update: update problems set title = #{title}, labels = #{labels}, problemDesc = #{problemDesc}, totalSubmit = #{totalSubmit}, acSubmit = #{acSubmit}, exampleInput = #{exampleInput}, exampleOutput = #{exampleOutput}, competitionOnly = ${competitionOnly}, memoryLimit = ${memoryLimit}, timeLimit = ${timeLimit} where pid = #{pid}
